targets.query:
from(bucket: "CER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_soilHumidity/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "LA66N717255")
  |> group(columns: ["devui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "CER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_soilConductivity/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "LA66N717255")
  |> group(columns: ["devui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "CER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_soilPH/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "LA66N717255")
  |> group(columns: ["devui"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "math"

nkplast = from(bucket: "CER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "LA66N717255")
  |> drop(columns: ["application_name"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen/ or r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_potassium/ or r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus/)
  |> toFloat()
  |> last()
  |> lowestMin(n:10, groupColumns: ["value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _measurement: "device_frmpayload_data_last"}))


data = from(bucket: "CER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> drop(columns: ["application_name"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "LA66N717255")
  |> toFloat()

  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
        r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen/ or 
        r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus/ or 
        r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_potassium/
    )
  
  |> last()




collected = union(tables: [nkplast, data])
// Collect values into a single table
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")

// Calculate NPK ratios and relative ratios
collected
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time:r._time,
        total: r.device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen + r.device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus + r.device_frmpayload_data_potassium,
        N: r.device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen,
        P: r.device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus,
        K: r.device_frmpayload_data_potassium,
        min_ratio: r.device_frmpayload_data_last
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        N: r.N,
        P: r.P,
        K: r.K,
        N_ratio: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.N / r.total),
        P_ratio: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.P / r.total),
        K_ratio: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.K / r.total),
        min_ratio: r.min_ratio
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        N: r.N,
        P: r.P,
        K: r.K,
        N_ratio: r.N_ratio,
        P_ratio: r.P_ratio,
        K_ratio: r.K_ratio,

        N_relative_ratio: math.round(x: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.N / r.min_ratio)/100.00),
        P_relative_ratio: math.round(x: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.P / r.min_ratio)/100.00),
        K_relative_ratio: math.round(x: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.K / r.min_ratio)/100.00)
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: string(v: r.N_relative_ratio) + "-" + string(v: r.P_relative_ratio) + "-" + string(v: r.K_relative_ratio)
    }))
//   |> keep(columns: ["_time", "N", "P", "K", "N_ratio", "P_ratio", "K_ratio", "N_relative_ratio", "P_relative_ratio", "K_relative_ratio"])

import "math"

nkplast = from(bucket: "CER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "LA665834587")
  |> drop(columns: ["application_name"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen/ or r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_potassium/ or r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus/)
  |> toFloat()
  |> last()
  |> lowestMin(n:10, groupColumns: ["value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _measurement: "device_frmpayload_data_last"}))


data = from(bucket: "CER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> drop(columns: ["application_name"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "LA665834587")
  |> toFloat()

  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
        r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen/ or 
        r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus/ or 
        r["_measurement"] =~ /device_frmpayload_data_potassium/
    )
  
  |> last()




collected = union(tables: [nkplast, data])
// Collect values into a single table
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")

// Calculate NPK ratios and relative ratios
collected
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time:r._time,
        total: r.device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen + r.device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus + r.device_frmpayload_data_potassium,
        N: r.device_frmpayload_data_nitrogen,
        P: r.device_frmpayload_data_phosphorus,
        K: r.device_frmpayload_data_potassium,
        min_ratio: r.device_frmpayload_data_last
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        N: r.N,
        P: r.P,
        K: r.K,
        N_ratio: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.N / r.total),
        P_ratio: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.P / r.total),
        K_ratio: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.K / r.total),
        min_ratio: r.min_ratio
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        N: r.N,
        P: r.P,
        K: r.K,
        N_ratio: r.N_ratio,
        P_ratio: r.P_ratio,
        K_ratio: r.K_ratio,

        N_relative_ratio: math.round(x: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.N / r.min_ratio)/100.00),
        P_relative_ratio: math.round(x: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.P / r.min_ratio)/100.00),
        K_relative_ratio: math.round(x: math.round(x: 100.0 * r.K / r.min_ratio)/100.00)
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: string(v: r.N_relative_ratio) + "-" + string(v: r.P_relative_ratio) + "-" + string(v: r.K_relative_ratio)
    }))
